#Lists the technologies used by MemWords.

= Technologies =

MemWords is developed in Java.
It uses [http://www.stripesframework.org/ Stripes] as its UI framework, and [http://jquery.com/ JQuery] as Javascript library. The project is built using [http://ant.apache.org Ant].

Unit tests are developed with [http://junit.org/ JUnit], and integration tests with [http://htmlunit.sourceforge.net/ HtmlUnit].

The quality of the code is controlled by [http://pmd.sourceForge.net/ PMD], [http://checkstyle.sourceforge.net/ Checkstyle] and [http://findbugs.sourceforge.net/ FindBugs].

Source code coverage is measured using [http://cobertura.sourceforge.net/ Cobertura].
